title: Ep123: 2nd Fife & Forfar Yeomanry - Operation Epsom
itunes:title: Ep123: 2nd Fife & Forfar Yeomanry - Operation Epsom
description:
Pete and Gary continue the story of the 2nd Fife & Forfars, a WW2 tank unit, as they take part in the epic Operation Epsom during the Battle of Normandy.


Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain

Publisher: Mat McLachlan

Producer: Jess Stebnicki
